detail_desc: Top in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Faux fur jacket with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Knee-length dress in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves, flap chest pockets with a button, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short skirt in patterned jersey containing glittery threads with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in a jacquard knit with a fastening at the back, seam at the hem and glittery tulle skirt. Partly lined.

Short, fitted dress in corduroy velour with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with decorative buttons and two slits at the front. Unlined.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs. Straight Fit.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length dress in a crinkled viscose weave with a low neckline front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist, a narrow, detachable tie belt with tassels, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with pleats at the shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Gentle A-line to the hem. Unlined.
Filigree metal earrings with perforated, leaf-shaped pendants. Diameter of earrings 3.5 cm, length with pendant 7 cm.
Cropped track pants in fast-drying functional fabric. Low waist with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring, a low crotch and tapered legs with contrasting colour piping down the sides and ribbed hems.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with faux fur pompoms on the top, a turned-up hem and earflaps with ties at the bottom. Fleece lining.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and an open section at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless jersey blouse with a small stand-up collar, opening with a long tie at the top and decorative gathers at the front and neck.
Cap in cotton twill with elastication at the back.
Coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, low dropped shoulders, side pockets and no fasteners. Lined.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Diagonal, welt front pockets and an elasticated, contrasting colour drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Boots in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Strapless, lace bandeau bra with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Side support, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.

Bikers in jersey with a firm shaping effect on the tummy and thighs and a push-up effect on the bum. High waist and a lined gusset. The bikers are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short dungaree dress with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, an open chest pocket and buttons at the sides.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Calf-length skirt in imitation leather with a zip fly, covered press-studs at the waist, diagonal front pockets and a slit at the front. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a small stand-up collar and cut-out section at the front. Long sleeves with wrapover sections on the shoulders.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking at the top and hem and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with contrasting colour trims around the neckline and sleeves.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Lined.
Top in an airy viscose weave with wide shoulder straps and decorative ties and box pleats at the sides.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in soft, ribbed jersey.

Long dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a gathered yoke at the back and a seam at the hem. Unlined.
Two-button jacket in a textured linen and cotton weave with a decorative chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long metal earrings with hoops and thin metal chains. Length 12.5 cm.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped opening and satin ties at the back. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Sleeveless dress with a top in cotton jersey and skirt in woven fabric. Open chest pocket with an embroidered detail on the front, patch side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck dress in satin with short butterfly sleeves and smocking at the shoulders and below the bust. Satin-lined skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Textured-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a pile-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button and hard-worn details that are patched on the inside.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front and a small slit at the back of the hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant in the shape of a crescent moon, and a trigger clasp. Adjustable length 48-57 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Pleated, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.

5-pocket, slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a super-high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
